title: Banana Caramel Slab Pie
directions: Melt the butter and stir in the crumbs. Press into 9x11 pan and bake at 350 for 8 minutes let cool.
Microwave the 3 ingredients for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally until smooth.
Beat ingredients together until peaks form.
Lay bananas on cooled crust. (slightly warm still is ok!)
Pour on most of the caramel or the amount to your liking.
Spread all the cream on top.
ingredients: 5 Tablespoons melted butter (Next time I will use 6T, so see how well your crumbs hold together-you want them to hold together well!!!)
